T02D3059:113a-1: a'arya aa tsa la s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D3059:113a-3: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3059:113a-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3059:113a-5: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / thugs sprul khro rgyal mi g-yo mgon //
T02D3059:113a-6: phyi nang bar chad sel mdzad lha //
T02D3059:113a-7: sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3059:113a-8: brtse ldan nyid kyis 'gro don du //
T02D3059:113a-9: rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag la //
T02D3059:113b-0: brten nas yang @113b dag gzung ba'i rim //
T02D3059:113b-1: khro rgyal mi g-yo'i sgrub thabs bri //
T02D3059:113b-2: dang po skyabs 'gro so sor thar //
T02D3059:113b-3: byang sems rig 'dzin sdom pa rnams //
T02D3059:113b-4: legs par thob bsrungs sngags pa yis //
T02D3059:113b-5: dben pa'i gnas sogs nyams dga' 'am //
T02D3059:113b-6: khang bzangs gtsang sbrar byas ba'i nang //
T02D3059:113b-7: mandal la sogs mchod ba dgram //
T02D3059:113b-8: sku gzugs la sogs de bzhin du //
T02D3059:113b-9: gtsang ldan yo byad gang 'byor ba //
T02D3059:113b-10: tho rangs khrus sogs chu sbyin bya //
T02D3059:113b-11: ku sha la sogs stan la bsdad //
T02D3059:113b-12: ha h'um hri dang ham mam sogs //
T02D3059:113b-13: sngags brjod khro bos bar chad bsal //
T02D3059:113b-14: bla ma yi dam dkon mchog rnams //
T02D3059:113b-15: dag pa'i gnas su gdan bzhugs la //
T02D3059:113b-16: phyag dang mchod pa sdig bshags dang //
T02D3059:113b-17: rjes su yi rang bskul gsol dang //
T02D3059:113b-18: byang chub bsngos la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D3059:113b-19: bsam gtan ting 'dzin mos pa bya //
T02D3059:113b-20: byang chub sems kyi rgyun spel phyir //
T02D3059:113b-21: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02D3059:113b-22: btang snyoms tshad med rnam pas ni /
T02D3059:113b-23: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya //
T02D3059:113b-24: 'gro rnams bde la dgod pa'i phyir //
T02D3059:113b-25: byang chub chen po'i sems rgyun bsgom //
T02D3059:113b-26: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang //
T02D3059:113b-27: me 'bral dang pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D3059:113b-28: phyag rgya dang bcas sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3059:113b-29: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am dharma dh'a tu ya sva bh'a wa a'atma konyham /
T02D3059:113b-30: rdo rje skyil krung rab bcas te //
T02D3059:113b-31: snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i //
T02D3059:113b-32: sa bon 'od sgra'i spro bsdu las //
T02D3059:113b-33: chos kun nam mkha' lta bu la //
T02D3059:113b-34: mtha' bzhi las grol rnam par bsgom //
T02D3059:113b-35: de nas stong nyid ngang las ni //
T02D3059:113b-36: skad cig sgyu ma'i lus su blta //
T02D3059:113b-37: 'od kyis thams cad h'um la bsdu //
T02D3059:113b-38: de nyid stong bar brtan bar bsgom //
T02D3059:113b-39: de yi ngang las nam mkha'i 'od //
T02D3059:113b-40: 'dra ba'i thugs kyi sa bon ni //
T02D3059:113b-41: sems kyi bdag nyid gsal bar blta //
T02D3059:113b-42: de 'og gam spros tshogs bdag ste //
T02D3059:113b-43: pam spros sna tshogs padmar blta //
T02D3059:113b-44: de steng ram las rta bdun pa //
T02D3059:113b-45: der ni h'um nyid blta bar bya //
T02D3059:113b-46: de las byung ba shes rab kyi //
T02D3059:113b-47: ral gri sngon po'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D3059:113b-48: nam mkha' ma lus 'gengs par blta //
T02D3059:113b-49: de las khro bo chen po ste //
T02D3059:113b-50: dri ma med pa gzhon nu'i sku //
T02D3059:113b-51: bdud la sogs pa rab 'joms pas //
T02D3059:113b-52: rnam rtog thams cad 'joms par bsgom //
T02D3059:114a-0: gzhon zhing sku rgyas sku mdog gnag /'od kyis nam mkha' @114a * //
T02D3059:114a-2: dbu skra dmar ser bcings shing 'phyang //
T02D3059:114a-3: sku ni 'gying bag rab tu g-yo //
T02D3059:114a-4: g-yon brkyang g-yas ni cung zad bskum //
T02D3059:114a-5: spyan gsum nyi zla bzhin du dmar //
T02D3059:114a-6: steng 'og phyogs bcur blta bar mdzad //
T02D3059:114a-7: mche ba rno dkar rab tu gtsugs //
T02D3059:114a-8: ljags ni klog ltar rab tu 'gyur //
T02D3059:114a-9: smin ma khro gnyer rab tu bsdu //
T02D3059:114a-10: phyag gnyis ral gri sbrul zhags bsnams //
T02D3059:114a-11: stag dang sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3059:114a-12: mi bskyod la sogs dbu rgyan can //
T02D3059:114a-14: khro rgyal sna tshogs sku las spro //
T02D3059:114a-15: ji ltar 'dod pas yongs su bskor//
T02D3059:114a-16: thugs kar pad nyi'i sten gdu ni //
T02D3059:114a-17: ye shes sems dpa' rang 'dra bsgom //
T02D3059:114a-18: yang de'i thugs kar nyi ma las //
T02D3059:114a-19: h'um ni 'od dang bcas par blta //
T02D3059:114a-20: khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni //
T02D3059:114a-22: rdo rje chags chen sku mdog dmar //
T02D3059:114a-23: chags par byed pa'i mda' gzhu 'dzin //
T02D3059:114a-24: rdo rje rnon po ljang gu ste //
T02D3059:114a-26: rdo rje 'bar ba dkar po ste //
T02D3059:114a-28: rdo rje khro bo ser po ste //
T02D3059:114a-29: phyag na ral gri 'bar ba bsnams //
T02D3059:114a-30: rdo rje gtum po ljang nag ste //
T02D3059:114a-31: sprin gyi zhags pa phyag na bsnams //
T02D3059:114a-32: rdo rje thabs bdag dud pa'i mdog / bya ba bye dpa'i rdza rnga bsnams //
T02D3059:114a-33: rdo rje stobs chen mthing ga ste //
T02D3059:114a-35: rdo rje sgyu stobs dmar nag ste //
T02D3059:114a-36: rdo rje bo con phyag na 'dzin //
T02D3059:114a-37: rdo rje rab 'byed sna tshogs mdog /'joms byed rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams //
T02D3059:114a-38: sa bcu'i yon tan bdag nyid can //
T02D3059:114a-40: h'um las ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D3059:114a-41: rang dang 'dra ba spyan drangs la //
T02D3059:114a-42: dza: h'um bam ho: yi ge bzhis //
T02D3059:114a-43: dgug gzhug bcing dang dges pa bskyed //
T02D3059:114a-44: aom dang a'a: dang h'um dang gsum //
T02D3059:114a-45: dkar dang dmar dang nag bo yi //
T02D3059:114a-46: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ni //
T02D3059:114a-47: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab //
T02D3059:114a-49: phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa la //
T02D3059:114a-50: dbang bskur yid kyis gsol ba gdab //
T02D3059:114a-51: thugs las sprul pa lhag pa'i lhas //
T02D3059:114a-52: rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D3059:114b-0: spyi gtsug dbang bskur rigs bdag @114b mtshan ;
T02D3059:114b-1: /'gro drug sems can thams cad la //
T02D3059:114b-2: byams pas blta bas blta ba'i phyir //
T02D3059:114b-3: mig tu h'um ni ser po dgod //
T02D3059:114b-4: srog gi nang du mam nag po //
T02D3059:114b-5: spyi bor ham ni rab tu dgod //
T02D3059:114b-6: lus kyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya bca' //
T02D3059:114b-7: ngag tu sngags 'di brjod par bya //
T02D3059:114b-8: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D3059:114b-9: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3059:114b-10: 'di yi rkyen gyis ma rig pa //
T02D3059:114b-11: 'jig cing ye shes skur byin brlab //
T02D3059:114b-12: de ltar rab rdzogs gsal bar bskyed //
T02D3059:114b-13: de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i skur //
T02D3059:114b-14: ji srid 'od kyi bar du bsgom //
T02D3059:114b-15: de nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i //
T02D3059:114b-16: h'um las byung ba'i sngags phreng gis //
T02D3059:114b-17: de nyid la ni g-yas skor la //
T02D3059:114b-18: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sngags 'di bzlas //
T02D3059:114b-19: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D3059:114b-20: tra th'a aa mo ka tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D3059:114b-22: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02D3059:114b-23: aa kr'a ma ye aa kr'a ma ye h'um /
T02D3059:114b-24: tra ta ham mam zhes pa'am /
T02D3059:114b-25: yang na aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3059:114b-26: aa tsa la ka na tsanda tsanda /
T02D3059:114b-28: ma tra ta ma tra ta /
T02D3059:114b-29: mo tra ta mo tra ta /
T02D3059:114b-35: mo ha sarba p'a pam ka ra /
T02D3059:114b-37: badzra ha sa aa mo ka ka ru /
T02D3059:114b-46: ma h'a mantra sa ka la /
T02D3059:114b-51: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D3059:114b-58: ma h'a badzra spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D3059:114b-59: tri ba li ta r'a ganta ka / h'um h'um mam mam ham ham /
T02D3059:114b-60: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'an /
T02D3059:114b-61: tsanda ma h'a ro sha n'a ya /
T02D3059:114b-64: aa phra ti ha ta aa tsa la tse dha /
T02D3059:114b-79: ka tra ta ka tra ta /
T02D3059:114b-82: aa ti ba la ae hi /
T02D3059:114b-83: ma h'a gu na bhi sha na /
T02D3059:114b-84: n'a ta ta n'a ta ta /
T02D3059:114b-89: aa tse ta ta ta ta /
T02D3059:114b-95: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D3059:114b-96: tra th'a aa mo ka / tsanda ma h'a ro shan'a /
T02D3059:114b-97: spo ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D3059:114b-99: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02D3059:114b-100: kra ma ya kra ma ya h'um /
T02D3059:115a-2: ti dza ma li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3059:115a-3: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D3059:115a-4: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3059:115a-5: aa tsa la tse dha spho ta ya spho ta ya h'um /
T02D3059:115a-6: aa sa lan tri ka tr'a h'a /
T02D3059:115a-7: ma h'a ba la sha ta /
T02D3059:115a-8: ba ra mantra aam aam h'am h'am /
T02D3059:115a-9: shuddha tree lo kya tu shye tu badzra /
T02D3059:115a-12: na ma: dzva la ya tra ta ;
T02D3059:115a-15: zhes pa 'bum la sogs par ni //
T02D3059:115a-16: man ngag can gyis bzlas pa bya //
T02D3059:115a-17: nges pa ni 'tshe ba la sogs pa'i //
T02D3059:115a-18: mi mthun phyogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D3059:115a-19: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams //
T02D3059:115a-21: de nas chos dbyings rab bzhin las //
T02D3059:115a-22: yongs su gnas pa bsgom par bya //
T02D3059:115a-23: de las skad cig lhar dmigs la //
T02D3059:115a-24: rin chen snod du gtsang ma'i rdzas //
T02D3059:115a-25: dkar gsum la sogs rtsi sman bcas //
T02D3059:115a-26: cha lnga'am bdun ni bsham par bya //
T02D3059:115a-27: de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02D3059:115a-28: aom sarba dharma ta badzra sa ti h'um /
T02D3059:115a-29: lan gsum brjod pas dag par bya //
T02D3059:115a-30: lus kyi mchod sbyin phyag rgya bcas //
T02D3059:115a-31: 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D3059:115a-32: aom aa mri te aom h'um hr'i: zhes brjod 'dod pa'i don du brlab //
T02D3059:115a-33: yang ni mchod sbyin phyag rgya bca' //
T02D3059:115a-34: ngag nas sngags 'di brjod bar bya //
T02D3059:115a-35: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo //
T02D3059:115a-36: bi shva mu khe bhya: sarba tatkham aungga te /
T02D3059:115a-37: spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham /
T02D3059:115a-38: lan gsum brjod pas spel bar bya //
T02D3059:115a-39: yang na rab gnas dbul ba'am //
T02D3059:115a-40: rje btsun phyogs skyong 'gro drug bcas //
T02D3059:115a-41: mdun gyis mkha' la spyan drangs la //
T02D3059:115a-42: byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa ni //
T02D3059:115a-43: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki ti /
T02D3059:115a-44: aom sam bhar sam bha ra h'um /
T02D3059:115a-45: zhes pa lan bdun sngags kyis ni //
T02D3059:115a-47: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D3059:115a-49: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3059:115a-50: chos bshad bstod la bden stobs brjod //
T02D3059:115a-51: bdag gi bsam pa'i stobs dang ni //
T02D3059:115a-52: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyin stobs dang //
T02D3059:115a-53: chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs rnams kyis //
T02D3059:115a-54: sems can kun la phan gdags phyir //
T02D3059:115a-55: don rnams bsam pa gang dag kun //
T02D3059:115a-56: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02D3059:115a-57: de dag thams cad ci rigs su //
T02D3059:115b-0: thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur sheg / gang 'dod phrin @115b las gzhol bar bya //
T02D3059:115b-1: lus kyis thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02D3059:115b-2: / sngags 'di brjod pas dam tshig gso //
T02D3059:115b-3: aom na ma: samnta buddh'a n'am /
T02D3059:115b-4: tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D3059:115b-5: aas me tri sa ma ya /
T02D3059:115b-7: sarba p'a pam shuddha sv'a h'a /
T02D3059:115b-8: badzra mu: yis ye shes gshegs //
T02D3059:115b-9: dge rtsa bsngos la smon lam gdab //
T02D3059:115b-10: spyod lam dag ni thams cad du //
T02D3059:115b-11: lha yi nga rgyal gsal bas bya //
T02D3059:115b-12: thun bzhi ru ni brtson pas bsgrub //
T02D3059:115b-13: sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa //
T02D3059:115b-14: ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams //
T02D3059:115b-15: lus dang srog la mi lta bar //
T02D3059:115b-16: yang dag par ni bsrud bar bya //
T02D3059:115b-17: bskyen pa tshad dang ldan pa yis //
T02D3059:115b-18: bsrung ba bdun sogs las rnams 'grub //
T02D3059:115b-19: raksha raksha h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3059:115b-20: aom sphu ta sphu ta ma h'a kro dha h'um phat /
T02D3059:115b-21: dzha ti dzha ti spho ta ya h'um phat /
T02D3059:115b-22: ces pas klu la mngag par bya'o //
T02D3059:115b-30: dha po dam tsag sa ma ya phye /
T02D3059:115b-41: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D3059:115b-42: t'um phat sv'a h'a h'um phat /
T02D3059:115b-44: ming 'jug gsum bzhi drug dang dgu / gnyis po dag la yang dag sbyar /
T02D3059:115b-48: mar na ha la ha la /
T02D3059:115b-51: m'a ra ya thum ril ril /
T02D3059:115b-53: man ngag ji bzhin bzlas pa bya //
T02D3059:115b-54: drag sngags 'bru btus bsdebs pa ni //
T02D3059:115b-55: 'bru bsdebs gsum dang de bzhin drug du dang kun thub gzugs brnyan can //
T02D3059:115b-56: bandhe sha y'a ba na dhe sha y'a /
T02D3059:115b-58: stvam bha y'a stam bha y'a /
T02D3059:115b-61: man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar //
T02D3059:115b-62: ting 'dzin bsrung ba zab mo ni //
T02D3059:115b-63: lus kyi gnad chen bcu gsum du //
T02D3059:115b-64: pang zla'i gdan la h'um las ni //
T02D3059:115b-65: rdo rje rgya gram re re bsgom//
T02D3059:115b-66: spyi bo dpral ba mig gnyis dang //
T02D3059:115b-67: rna pa gnyis dang sna gnyis sdang //
T02D3059:115b-68: ha dang dpung pa gnyis dang ni //
T02D3059:115b-69: snying ga gsang blta ba dang //
T02D3059:115b-70: bshang sgo pus mo gnyis po dang //
T02D3059:115b-71: rkang mthil rnams su gnas pa'o //
T02D3059:115b-72: de nas gsang sngags gang rung bzlas //
T02D3059:115b-73: ma yis phyi nang bar chad pas la /
T02D3059:116a-0: @116a * // bza' btud sngags kyis byin brlabs spyad //
T02D3059:116a-1: ngag nas rdo rje rgya gram ni //
T02D3059:116a-2: gser las grub pa'i byin gyis brlabs //
T02D3059:116a-3: ngag dang yid kyis bzlas pa yang //
T02D3059:116a-4: ji ltar 'dod bzhin bzlas pa bya //
T02D3059:116a-5: nang gi sbyin sreg klu la bya //
T02D3059:116a-6: mi ldog rtags kyis klu rnams mnan /
T02D3059:116a-7: ma h'a k'a las bstan pa bsrung //
T02D3059:116a-8: 'khor lo sbas pas klu la sbyar //
T02D3059:116a-9: rnal 'byor bsrung phyir ral gris bzlog / yul khams bsrung dang sri'u gso //
T02D3059:116a-10: nang chen gso dang 'byung po bskrad //
T02D3059:116a-11: rtsa ra shing ltar bya ba dang //
T02D3059:116a-12: dbang du bya dang rmongs pa dang //
T02D3059:116a-13: ral gri bum pa sa spyod dang //
T02D3059:116a-14: rkang mgyogs mkha' spyod mig sman sogs //
T02D3059:116a-15: las rnams the tshom yod ma yin //
T02D3059:116a-16: 'di bkod dge ba gang yin des //
T02D3059:116a-17: bar chad sel zhing tshogs rdzogs nas //
T02D3059:116a-19: bla med byang chub myur thob shog /'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3059:116a-20: bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3059:116a-22: // / slob dpon d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na sa rang 'gyur du mdzad nas /
